tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_geography GEOGRAPHY,
    waste_type TEXT,
    quantity FLOAT,
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE GIS_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL,
  collection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Waste_Analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  methane_level DECIMAL,
  waste_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE GeospatialData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE GIS_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Waste_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES GIS_Data(id),
  collection_date DATE,
  weight DECIMAL(8, 2),
  is_biodegradable BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Spatial_Analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Planning (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_date DATE,
  plan_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(20)
)
